original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
Based on the git diff, here's a concise summary of the key changes:

### Summary
- Increased retry attempts (8→12) and delay (15→30s) in GitHub Actions' retry-command
- Restructured dependency caching documentation:
  - Added new overview page
  - Created cache management guide
  - Converted caching reference to standalone document
- Improved accessibility:
  - Fixed tooltip text spacing
  - Enhanced focus indicators for high contrast mode
  - Added ARIA attributes to navigation elements
- Added sidebar support for `layout: category-landing` pages
- Extended Copilot Coding Agent to support remote MCP servers
- Updated pre-release license terms to expand indemnity coverage
- Converted redirect utility to TypeScript with improved type safety

### Title
Enhance Actions caching, improve accessibility, extend Copilot MCP support, and update legal terms
